text: Edith Madeleine Carroll (26 February 1906 â€“ 2 October 1987) was an English and American actress. At the peak of her success, she (at that time) was the highest paid actress in the world. She earned just over $250,000 in 1938. She acted in movies and radio. She starred in several Alfred Hitchcock thrillers including The 39 Steps (1935) and Secret Agent. She also played Gail in Honeymoon in Bali (1939). Carroll was born in West Bromwich, England. She died from pancreatic cancer at age 81 in Marbella, Spain. ==References== Category:English radio actors Category:English movie actors Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:1906 births Category:1987 deaths
title: Madeleine Carroll
